entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
